attributes.comment:
Dear USCIS, I think you just increased the fees from $260 in 2004 to $330 for N-
400 application. I have been involved with INS and currently now the USCIS
department and the fees have always increased probably because of your thinking
that immigrants will pay any fees imposed by them than risking the
consequences with your department.

I am all for increase in fees if this translates to faster processing times and better
services. I still don't see that happening and still face below par treatment when
dealing with your department. How often do we see increases in fees for other
services that we obtain for our daily life like utilities, phone bill etc. They don't
increase fees by leaps every 2 years or so. Please be aware of the prices of other
services in society before making this fee increase.

Your respectfully,

A Potential citizen.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By a Potential Citizen
